privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.intro: Rizko.ai ("we," "us," or "our") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our social media analytics platform and services.
privacyPolicy.summary: We only access data you explicitly authorize through OAuth. We never post on your behalf, sell your data, or share it with advertisers. You can disconnect your accounts and delete your data at any time.

sections.socialMediaInfo: 1.2 Information from Connected Social Media Accounts

neverDoList: Post, modify, or delete content on your social media accounts
Sell your personal data to third parties
Use your data for advertising purposes
Share your analytics with other users without your consent
privacyPolicy.importantNote: We do NOT access your private messages, passwords, payment information from social platforms, or any data from accounts you haven't explicitly connected.
privacyPolicy.socialDataIntro: When you connect your social media accounts via OAuth, we access only the following data with your explicit consent:

platformTable.tiktok: Public profile info, video list, video statistics (views, likes, comments, shares)
platformTable.instagram: Business/Creator account profile, media list, engagement metrics
platformTable.youtube: Channel information, video list, video analytics (via YouTube Data API)

privacyPolicy.acknowledgment: By using Rizko.ai, you acknowledge that you have read and understood this Privacy Policy.

termsOfService.title: Terms of Service
termsOfService.intro: Welcome to Rizko.ai. These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your access to and use of our social media analytics platform, website, and services (collectively, the "Service"). By accessing or using our Service, you agree to be bound by these Terms.
termsOfService.importantNotice: Please read these Terms carefully before using our Service. If you do not agree to these Terms, you may not access or use the Service.
termsOfService.acknowledgment: By using Rizko.ai, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service.

dataPolicy.title: Data Policy
dataPolicy.intro: This Data Policy explains how Rizko.ai collects, processes, stores, and protects data from your connected social media accounts. We are committed to transparency about our data practices and compliance with platform-specific API requirements.
dataPolicy.commitment: We only access data you explicitly authorize. We use official platform APIs with OAuth authentication. We never post on your behalf or access private messages.

readOnly.title: Read-Only Access
readOnly.description: We never post, modify, or delete content on your accounts

encrypted.title: Encrypted Storage
encrypted.description: OAuth tokens and data are encrypted at rest

deletion.title: 7-Day Deletion
deletion.description: Data from disconnected accounts deleted within 7 days

export.title: Data Export
export.description: Request a copy of your data at any time

sections.dataWeCollect: 1. Data We Collect from Connected Accounts

retentionTable.activeAccount: Data retained while account is active
retentionTable.tokenExpiry: Tokens refreshed automatically or deleted if refresh fails
retentionTable.backupData: Purged within 90 days of deletion request

dataPolicy.tiktokNotAccess: Private messages, drafts, followers list, or any content from other accounts.
dataPolicy.instagramNotAccess: Direct messages, comments (as separate entity), or personal profile data.
dataPolicy.instagramNote: Instagram integration requires a Business or Creator account linked to a Facebook Page.
dataPolicy.youtubeNotAccess: Private videos, unlisted videos, comment content, or subscriber identities.
whatWeNeverDoList: Post, edit, or delete any content on your social media accounts
Access your private messages or conversations
Sell your data to third parties
Share your individual analytics with other users
Use your data for advertising purposes
Build profiles or databases of your followers
Collect data from accounts you haven't connected
dataPolicy.acknowledgment: By connecting your social media accounts to Rizko.ai, you acknowledge that you have read and understood this Data Policy.

usagePolicy.title: Usage Policy

sections.acceptableUseText: Rizko.ai is designed for legitimate content creation and trend analysis. Users agree to use the platform responsibly and in compliance with all applicable laws.
prohibitedList: Automated scraping or data harvesting beyond platform limits
Sharing account credentials with third parties
Using the service for spam or misleading content
Attempting to reverse engineer our algorithms
sections.aiContentText: Scripts and content generated by our AI are provided as suggestions. Users are responsible for reviewing and editing content before publishing.
sections.rateLimitsText: Each plan has specific usage limits. Exceeding these limits may result in temporary restrictions or account suspension.
sections.terminationText: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate this policy.

usagePolicy.disclaimer: This policy is subject to change. Full terms coming soon.

dataDeletion.title: Data Deletion Request
dataDeletion.subtitle: Request deletion of your personal data from Rizko.ai

privacyRights.title: Your Privacy Rights
privacyRights.description: Under GDPR, CCPA, and other privacy regulations, you have the right to request deletion of your personal data. We will process your request within 30 days.

whatGetsDeleted.title: What data will be deleted?
whatGetsDeleted.description: Upon processing your request, we will permanently delete:
items: Connected social media account data and OAuth tokens
Saved videos, analytics history, and preferences
whatGetsDeleted.retentionNote: Some data may be retained for legal or compliance purposes (e.g., payment records for tax purposes). This retained data will be anonymized where possible.

form.title: Submit Deletion Request
form.description: Enter the email address associated with your Rizko.ai account
form.error: Something went wrong. Please try again.
form.confirmationText: By submitting this request, you confirm that you are the owner of this account and understand that this action is irreversible.

success.title: Request Submitted Successfully
success.description: We've received your data deletion request. You will receive a confirmation email at {{email}}.
success.saveCode: Please save this code for your records
success.processedWithin: Your request will be processed within 30 days
success.emailConfirmation: You will receive email confirmation when deletion is complete

emailRequest.title: Email Request
emailRequest.description: Send an email to {{email}} with subject "Data Deletion Request" and include your account email.

selfService.title: Self-Service (Logged-in Users)
selfService.description: If you can access your account, go to Settings -> Account -> Delete Account

instagramMeta.title: Instagram/Meta Users
instagramMeta.description: If you connected your Instagram account and want to delete data through Meta's system, you can also use the Data Deletion callback that Meta provides. When you disconnect Rizko.ai from your Instagram settings, we automatically receive a deletion callback and process your data removal.
